name: MUA
description:
MUA is an online FPS title in which players take control of characters and challenge other players online in five-versus-five objective based battles. Featuring fast-paced action and immersive controls, players can switch between many different characters to suit the ever changing battle conditions. Utilize their unique characteristics and cooperate with teammates to secure the win.

This game features the ability to quickly compete online against other users.
Use various characters to win the battle!
